name: Basel III Capital Requirements
description: Ensures Tier 1 capital and leverage ratios meet Basel III standards.

name: Clinical Trial Safety Reporting
description: Checks for serious adverse events and minimum enrollment thresholds.

name: GDPR Access Request Timeliness
description: Verifies access requests are processed within legal time limits.

name: Emissions Compliance Check
description: Validates CO2e limits and checks if company is in a regulated industry.
